channel.title: Having bad login i cant figure it out
channel.description:
java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrameVarsize(stream.java:42) at client.sendMessage(client.java:14310) at client.logout(client.java:6705) at PlayerHandler.savegame(PlayerHandler.java:402) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(playerhandler.java:394) at playerhandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:256) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.thread.run(Unknown Source) connection reset java.net.socketexception: connection reset at java.net.socketInputStreak.read(unknown source) at java.net.socketInputStreak.read(unknown source) at client.fillinstream(client.java:4429) at java.lang.thread.run(unknown source) clienthandler: client null disconnected (ip00-000-000-000.aa.aa.aaa.aaa) //My Ip covered\\ this keeps rolling over and over till connection reset
i have no clue im useing a dev 7 base and i can connect with localhost but not my ip or the no-ip i have useing mopar client and a delta client :/ any help will be useful to this problem
BUMP
